# Configuration

All configuration is read via environment variables with the `PREFIX_` prefix, or via a configuration file.

<!-- This file is auto-generated by configdoc. Do not edit manually. -->

## Server

| Config variable | Env variable | Default | Description |
|---|---|---|---|
| `server.http.host`<br>`server.host` | `PREFIX_SERVER_HTTP_HOST`<br>`PREFIX_SERVER_HOST` | `localhost` | Hostname the server binds to |
| `server.http.maxRequestBodySize` | `PREFIX_SERVER_HTTP_MAX_REQUEST_BODY_SIZE` | `1048576` | ðŸ”„ Maximum request body size |
| `server.http.port` | `PREFIX_SERVER_HTTP_PORT` | `8080` | HTTP server port |
| `server.http.rateLimit` | `PREFIX_SERVER_HTTP_RATE_LIMIT` | `100.0` | Rate limit (requests per second) |
| `server.http.readHeaderTimeout` | `PREFIX_SERVER_HTTP_READ_HEADER_TIMEOUT` | `10s` | Read header timeout |
| `server.http.tls.enabled` | `PREFIX_SERVER_HTTP_TLS_ENABLED`<br>`TLS_ENABLED` | `false` | Enable TLS |

## Tenant

| Config variable | Env variable | Default | Description |
|---|---|---|---|
| `tenant.<id>.maxConnections` | `PREFIX_TENANT_<ID>_MAX_CONNECTIONS` | `100` | Per-tenant max connections |
| `tenant.<id>.requestTimeout` | `PREFIX_TENANT_<ID>_REQUEST_TIMEOUT` | `30s` | Per-tenant request timeout |

## Ungrouped

| Config variable | Env variable | Default | Description |
|---|---|---|---|
| `deploymentName` | `PREFIX_DEPLOYMENT_NAME`<br>`RELEASE_NAME` | `rudder-app` | Application deployment name |
